lines.text: Only two things in the world I'm scared of
Only scared of two things, what's that?
Women and the police.
You two are more fun than going to an all-night dentist.
What happened to you?
I was tryin' to save these two buddies of mine from getting knocked up by a homosexual.
Oh, praise god!

[holding a knife at Gator's throat]
You can eat my grub... I'll let you haul my whiskey... but don't you ever do me no *wrong*!
How'd you like that knife shoved up yer ass?

[long pause]
I wouldn't like that at all.
Hey, Gator. Tell me somethin'. Was you scared back there when ol' Big Bear pulled that pig sticker on you?
Hmph... Scared shitless.
Ready?
I was born ready!
You OK?
You see me walkin', don't ya?
[last line]
The good, they die young!
I'm so hungry I could eat the tail-end out of a hobby-horse.
What you is writing in that little book about?
I'm writin the story of my life, Darlin'
Yea?... Am I in it?
You're workin on it.
You damn peanuthead, you don't know your camp from second base, you know that?
I don't have to take that crap from nobody!
You super giant ass!
[fight breaks out]

[Upon meeting Sheriff Connors]
Only two things in the world I'm scared of.
Only two things?... Whats that?
Women and the police.
I bet you spend your time tryin' to hump both.
Yup.

[Junior and Sheriff Connors are chasing Gator]
Junior, you know if you lose this thing, it's comin' outta your pay?... You know that don't ya?

[Junior wrecks the police car]
I told ya didn't I?... I TOLD YA, AND I TOLD YA!... Damn hardhead!
